metadata.title: Appendix: OWASP Top 10 Coverage Analysis - Detailed Tables
metadata.author: Ivan Bylina

abstract: This appendix provides detailed coverage analysis tables for each OWASP Top 10 (2025) risk category, documenting AWS Security Agent's capabilities in detecting, testing, and remediating specific vulnerability classes across design review, code review, and penetration testing capabilities.

sections.title: A01: Broken Access Control
paragraphs: This section provides detailed coverage analysis for broken access control vulnerabilities.

sections.title: A02: Security Misconfiguration
paragraphs: This section provides detailed coverage analysis for security misconfiguration vulnerabilities.

sections.title: A03: Software Supply Chain Failures
paragraphs: This section provides detailed coverage analysis for software supply chain vulnerabilities.

sections.title: A04: Cryptographic Failures
paragraphs: This section provides detailed coverage analysis for cryptographic failure vulnerabilities.

sections.title: A05: Injection
paragraphs: This section provides detailed coverage analysis for injection vulnerabilities.

sections.title: A06: Insecure Design
paragraphs: This section provides detailed coverage analysis for insecure design vulnerabilities.

sections.title: A07: Authentication Failures
paragraphs: This section provides detailed coverage analysis for authentication failure vulnerabilities.

sections.title: A08: Software or Data Integrity Failures
paragraphs: This section provides detailed coverage analysis for software and data integrity failure vulnerabilities.

sections.title: A09: Security Logging and Alerting Failures
paragraphs: This section provides detailed coverage analysis for security logging and alerting failure vulnerabilities.

sections.title: A10: Mishandling of Exceptional Conditions
paragraphs: This section provides detailed coverage analysis for exceptional condition handling vulnerabilities.
